title: Call of Duty
description:
The military has a history of using video games to recruit. So why was there a backlash when its soldier-gamers started playing online?

Featuring
Matthew Gault (@mjgault)
Corey Mead (@coreydmead)

Links
The Pentagon Wasn’t Ready for Gamers to Push Back
America's Digital Army: Games at Work and War
